00043 gboolean
00044 is_hald_running (void)
00045 {
00046     gchar *udi;
00047     gboolean running;
00048     running = hal_device_get_string (
00049         "/org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/computer",
00050         "info.udi", &udi);
00051     g_free (udi);
00052     return running;
00053 }

00059 gboolean
00060 hal_pm_check (void)
00061 {
00062     gboolean pm;
00063     hal_device_get_bool (
00064         "/org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/computer",
00065         "power_management.is_enabled", &pm);
00066     return pm;
00067 }

00076 gboolean
00077 hal_device_get_bool (const gchar *udi, const gchar *key, gboolean *value)
00078 {
00079     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00080     DBusGProxy *hal_proxy = NULL;
00081     GError *error = NULL;
00082     gboolean retval;
00083 
00084     /* assertion checks */
00085     g_assert (udi);
00086     g_assert (key);
00087     g_assert (value);
00088 
00089     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00090         return FALSE;
00091     hal_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (system_connection,
00092         "org.freedesktop.Hal", udi, "org.freedesktop.Hal.Device");
00093     retval = TRUE;
00094     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (hal_proxy, "GetPropertyBoolean", &error, 
00095             G_TYPE_STRING, key, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00096             G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, value, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00097         dbus_glib_error (error);
00098         *value = FALSE;
00099         retval = FALSE;
00100     }
00101     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (hal_proxy));
00102     return retval;
00103 }

00115 hal_device_get_string (const gchar *udi, const gchar *key, gchar **value)

00124     g_assert (key);
00125     g_assert (value);
00126 
00127     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00128         return FALSE;

00130         "org.freedesktop.Hal", udi, "org.freedesktop.Hal.Device");
00131     retval = TRUE;
00132     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (hal_proxy, "GetPropertyBoolean", &error, 
00133             G_TYPE_STRING, key, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00134             G_TYPE_STRING, value, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00135         dbus_glib_error (error);
00136         *value = NULL;
00137         retval = FALSE;

00139     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (hal_proxy));

00151 hal_device_get_int (const gchar *udi, const gchar *key, gint *value)
00152 {
00153     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00154     DBusGProxy *hal_proxy = NULL;

00158     /* assertion checks */
00159     g_assert (udi);
00160     g_assert (key);
00161     g_assert (value);
00162 
00163     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00164         return FALSE;

00185 gboolean
00186 hal_find_device_capability (const gchar *capability, gchar ***value)
00187 {
00188     DBusGConnection *system_connection;
00189     DBusGProxy *hal_proxy = NULL;
00190     GError *error = NULL;
00191     gboolean retval;
00192 
00193     /* assertion checks */
00194     g_assert (capability);
00195     g_assert (value);
00196 
00197     if (!dbus_get_system_connection (&system_connection))
00198         return FALSE;
00199     hal_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (system_connection,
00200         "org.freedesktop.Hal", 
00201         "/org/freedesktop/Hal/Manager", 
00202         "org.freedesktop.Hal.Manager");
00203     retval = TRUE;
00204     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (hal_proxy, "FindDeviceByCapability", &error, 
00205             G_TYPE_STRING, capability, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00206             G_TYPE_STRV, value, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00207         dbus_glib_error (error);
00208         *value = NULL;
00209         retval = FALSE;
00210     }
00211     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (hal_proxy));
00212     return retval;
00213 }

00219 void
00220 hal_free_capability (gchar **value)
00221 {
00222     gint i;
00223 
00224     /* assertion checks */
00225     g_assert (value);
00226 
00227     for (i = 0; value[i]; i++) {
00228         g_free (value[i]);
00229     }
00230     g_free (value);
00231 }
00232 
00238 gint
00239 hal_num_devices_of_capability (const gchar *capability)
00240 {
00241     gint i;
00242     gchar **names;
00243 
00244     /* assertion checks */
00245     g_assert (capability);
00246 
00247     hal_find_device_capability (capability, &names);
00248     if (!names) {
00249         g_debug ("No devices of capability %s", capability);
00250         return 0;
00251     }
00252     /* iterate to find number of items */
00253     for (i = 0; names[i]; i++) {};
00254     hal_free_capability (names);
00255     g_debug ("%i devices of capability %s", i, capability);
00256     return i;
00257 }
00258 
00266 gint
00267 hal_num_devices_of_capability_with_value (const gchar *capability, 
00268     const gchar *key, const gchar *value)
00269 {
00270     gint i;
00271     gint valid = 0;
00272     gchar **names;
00273     gchar *type;
00274 
00275     /* assertion checks */
00276     g_assert (capability);
00277     g_assert (key);
00278     g_assert (value);
00279 
00280     hal_find_device_capability (capability, &names);
00281     if (!names) {
00282         g_debug ("No devices of capability %s", capability);
00283         return 0;
00284     }
00285     for (i = 0; names[i]; i++) {
00286         hal_device_get_string (names[i], key, &type);
00287         if (strcmp (type, value) == 0)
00288             valid++;
00289         g_free (type);
00290     };
00291     hal_free_capability (names);
00292     g_debug ("%i devices of capability %s where %s is %s", 
00293         valid, capability, key, value);
00294     return valid;
00295 }
